issue.title: [Java] Dictionary entries are required in IPC streams even when empty
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6040](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6040). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Java's ArrowReader requires that dictionaries are sent in an IPC stream: <https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/java/vector/src/main/java/org/apache/arrow/vector/ipc/ArrowReader.java#L196-L200>.

However, as noted in ARROW-6006, that is not required if the stream contains no values.
